name: Daewoo K5
description: The Daewoo K5 is a South Korean manufactured pistol. The pistol is special due to having 'Fast Action' or Triple Action or Double Action Plus+. This nifty action allows the hammer to be decocked while the main spring remains compressed. This action allows the trigger to have the travel length of a double action and the trigger pull weight of a single action, this allows the gun to be safer and more accurate!
